blogPost.excerpt: Iteratively prevents wasted time, increased costs, and poor decision-making from bad data by giving product, data and engineering teams the opportunity to collaborate on analytics while enforcing your schema. We empower you to take control of your data 🚀
blogPost.body: Iteratively prevents wasted time, increased costs, and poor decision-making from bad data by giving product, data and engineering teams the opportunity to collaborate on analytics while enforcing your schema. We empower you to take control of your data 🚀
blogPost.title: Iteratively - Capture customer data you trust
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 通过给产品、数据和工程团队提供合作分析的机会，同时执行您的模式，迭代地防止因不良数据而浪费时间、增加成本和不良决策。我们使您能够控制您的数据🚀。
localize.tagline: 采集您信任的客户数据

localize.description: 通過給產品、數據和工程團隊提供合作分析的機會，同時執行您的模式，迭代地防止因不良數據而浪費時間、增加成本和不良決策。我們使您能夠控制您的數據🚀。
localize.tagline: 採集您信任的客戶數據

previous.excerpt: WellSpeak is a mobile app that helps you to become confident in your English speaking skills. AI and smart algorithms will help you with pronunciation and show how easy it is to speak like a native 😎"
previous.title: WellSpeak - Practice your English to speak fluently, easily, confidently

localize.description: WellSpeak是一款移动应用，可以帮助你对自己的英语口语能力充满信心。AI和智能算法将帮助您掌握发音，并向您展示如何轻松地像母语一样说话😎"。
localize.tagline: 练习你的英语，使你能流利、轻松、自信地说话。

localize.description: WellSpeak是一款移動應用，可以幫助你對自己的英語口語能力充滿信心。AI和智能算法將幫助您掌握髮音，並向您展示如何輕鬆地像母語一樣說話😎"。
localize.tagline: 練習你的英語，使你能流利、輕鬆、自信地說話。

next.excerpt: Socialize with your coworkers through fun games right in your Slack workspace. It's free while we're in Beta! Games: - Spot the Faker: A game of accusations and deception - Medium Roast: Roast your colleagues (SFW) - Trivia: 50+ categories, 5k+ questions
next.title: Bored for Slack - Play social games with your coworkers on Slack

localize.description: 在Slack工作空间中通过有趣的游戏与同事进行社交。在我们处于测试版的时候，它是免费的。游戏： - Spot the Faker: 指控和欺骗的游戏 - 中型烤肉。中型烤肉：烤你的同事（SFW） - 琐事：50+类别，5k+问题。
localize.tagline: 在Slack上与同事玩社交游戏

localize.description: 在Slack工作空間中通過有趣的遊戲與同事進行社交。在我們處於測試版的時候，它是免費的。遊戲： - Spot the Faker: 指控和欺騙的遊戲 - 中型烤肉。中型烤肉：烤你的同事（SFW） - 瑣事：50+類別，5k+問題。
localize.tagline: 在Slack上與同事玩社交遊戲
